name: Feather Hair Extensions- White/pink/natural
description:
This is a bundle of feathers you can attatch to your hair! 

Includes 6 feathers, 2 clamping beads and 1 threading tool in total. 

The longest feather is about 6 inches long!

This particular bundle has a nice pop of summery pink!

Super hippie/boho chic!

2 solid white feathers

2 peacock strands

1 black and white feather

1 pink spotted feather

2 black clamping beads

1 threading tool 

All you need to do is thread the bead in your hair, then attatch the feathers one by one. 

Once they are all in the bead, you clamp the bead down to your piece of hair and there you go! 

The feathers can be treated almost like real hair. You can straighten and curl them on low heat. 

Includes two clamping beads so you can re-wear these feathers, or you can split the bundle and make two different ones!

These are a great way to express your personality without doing anything permanent or damaging to your hair!
